name: psychology_clinic_backend
description: Django-based back end for the psychology clinic website.

apps.name: core
apps.description: Handles project-wide settings and core views.

apps.name: users
apps.description: Manages user accounts (clients and psychologists) and authentication.

apps.name: services
apps.description: Manages services, specialisations, and psychologist profiles.

apps.name: appointments
apps.description: Manages the booking system, availability, and scheduling.

apps.name: billing
apps.description: Manages payments, invoices, and Medicare rebates.

apps.name: resources
apps.description: Manages blog posts and other content.
